scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && cp -r tests/features dist/tests/
scripts.test: npm run build && wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.test:chrome: npm run build && BROWSER=chrome wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.test:firefox: npm run build && BROWSER=firefox wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.test:mobile: npm run build && MOBILE=true BROWSER=chrome HEADLESS=true wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.test:tag: npm run build && TAGS='@smoke' wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.test:spec: npm run build && SPEC=./dist/tests/features/create-item.feature wdio run config/wdio.conf.cjs
scripts.docker:wait: timeout 60 bash -c 'until curl -f http://localhost:4444/status; do sleep 2; done'
scripts.test:docker: npm run build && BROWSER=firefox WDIO_HOST=localhost WDIO_PORT=4444 wdio run config/wdio.docker.cjs
scripts.test:docker:tag: npm run build && BROWSER=firefox WDIO_HOST=localhost WDIO_PORT=4444 TAGS='@smoke' wdio run config/wdio.docker.cjs
